title: Pay to Play Publishing & Resume Padding
dc:creator: Queens Podcast Lab
description:
Joe, Leslie, and Gabriel discuss a scandal in which CUNY faculty were being probed for using pay-to-play publications for jobs and promotions. We discuss the broader role of vanity presses and pay-to-publish outlets in our industry.

Photo Credit. By Mykl Roventine – https://www.flickr.com/photos/myklroventine/3405291415/, CC BY 2.0, https://commons.wikimedia.org/w/index.php?curid=8277883
